game.name: Observa
game.genres: 어드벤처, 캐주얼, 인디, 시뮬레이션, 무료 플레이
game.shortDescription: Alone on a floating island in deep space, you use your telescope to study the universe, capture what you find, and confront the growing sense that something out there is aware of you.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Alone on a floating island in deep space, you use your telescope to study the universe, capture what you find, and confront the growing sense that something out there is aware of you.
